name: Ardvorlich House Bed and Breakfast Guest House Accommodation

reviews.text: I stayed at this B&B in June, 2007, with family and friends, and have returned in June, 2013 with other friends. The property is just south of the little village of Ardlui, and about five miles north of Tarbet on the busy A82 highway that runs along the west shore of Loch Lomond. A bit of caution is needed while driving this scenic route, because large buses and lorries make frequent use of this, frequently straddling the middle line as they go on their merry way. Just be alert!
reviews.title: Clean, modern B&B with a superb view of a superb beauty spot!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The B&B itself has about 5 ensuite bedrooms, each with cable TV and WiFi access. The owners, Helelor and Nancy, are friendly and take pride in their lovely property. Don't be startled by the occasional rumble of a passenger train to or from Glasgow; the rail line is directly behind the property, but there are only four or five trains a day; none later than 11 PM or earlier than 8 AM. The train stops at the nearby town of Ardlui, and the owners of the B&B will arrange to pick you up at the station, I believe.
reviews.title: Romantic Loch Lomond B&B

reviews.text: There is ample car parking alongside the house, and a delicious full breakfast is served. Tea and coffee are furnished in the rooms, along with delicious Scottish shortbread and cookies! I also had a very good night's sleep, in a quiet, cozy room on the ground floor. The bed was very comfortable!
reviews.title: a lovely stay again

reviews.text: I highly recommend this superb B&B!
reviews.title: very friendly place to stay

reviews.text: Beautifully located on the western shore of Loch Lomond just south of Ardlui, this is the best B&B we have ever found. The owners are ready to collect folk from the nearest West Highland Railway station at Ardlui, or from the West Highland Way just across the narrow neck of Loch Lomond opposite. Everything about the place was perfect, from the view to the lovely decor, the comfort of the room, the food etc. Plus we had the entertainment value of watching innumerable birds feeding at the feeders on the terrace outside the picture windows.
reviews.title: Great place to stay.

aka: Ardvorlich House Bed And Breakfast Guest House Accommodation Ardlui, Scotland
